name: water-spout
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases with the user’s remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.
short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user spouts water to damage opposing Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the move’s power.
